achievements.name: Brave New World
achievements.description: Colonize a planet

achievements.name: Digging Deep
achievements.description: Earn a total Mineral income each month above 250

achievements.name: The Industrial Re-Revolution
achievements.description: Earn a total Mineral income each month above 1000

achievements.name: Energetic
achievements.description: Store/have 1000 EC

achievements.name: Power Overwhelming
achievements.description: Store/have 5000 EC

achievements.name: Birth of a Federation
achievements.description: Establish a Federation

achievements.name: New Shining Star
achievements.description: Upgrade your capital to an Imperial Complex

achievements.name: Battle Thralls
achievements.description: Have 3 other Empires as vassals

achievements.name: Explorer
achievements.description: Survey one of each basic planet class

achievements.name: Grand Admiral
achievements.description: Have an Empire total fleet power of 100,000+

achievements.name: Building Better Worlds
achievements.description: Terraform a planet

achievements.name: Domo Arigato
achievements.description: Build a Robot Pop

achievements.name: Clever Girl
achievements.description: Uplift a species

achievements.name: Faster, Stronger, Better
achievements.description: Genetically alter a species (not uplift)

achievements.name: The Grand Fleet
achievements.description: Build a fleet with a total fleet size above 120

achievements.name: A Home Away From Home
achievements.description: Conquer another species' homeworld

achievements.name: Break On Through...
achievements.description: Research a Rare technology

achievements.name: ... To the Other Side
achievements.description: Research 15 Rare technologies in a single game

achievements.name: Mutual Understanding
achievements.description: Successfully negotiate a trade deal

achievements.name: Supremacy
achievements.description: Win a War against another Empire

achievements.name: Queening
achievements.description: Successfully capture an extragalactic matriarch

achievements.name: Rift Sealed
achievements.description: Destroy the portals employed by the invaders from another time and space

achievements.name: Voight-Kampff
achievements.description: Develop the means to prevent nefarious infiltration

achievements.name: Victorious
achievements.description: Win the game through any victory condition in Ironman Mode

achievements.name: Hear Me Roar
achievements.description: Hatch the egg

achievements.name: Infinite Creation
achievements.description: Birth a new universe

achievements.name: Whence It Came
achievements.description: Defeat a horrifying invader

achievements.name: Dreadnought
achievements.description: Restore an ancient warship

achievements.name: Stellar Performance
achievements.description: Take a trophy from a stellar being

achievements.name: Warrior of Light
achievements.description: Destroy a wraith

achievements.name: Unravelling Enigma
achievements.description: Uncover the secrets of an ancient fortress

achievements.name: Patron
achievements.description: Support the Artisan Troupe for 10 years

achievements.name: Mad Genius
achievements.description: Recruit a scientist from the Curators

achievements.name: The Good Stuff
achievements.description: Purchase a rare resource from the Traders

achievements.name: Return to Dust
achievements.description: Destroy an Enclave

achievements.name: Last, Best Hope
achievements.description: Lead the non-aligned powers to victory against an Awakened Empire

achievements.name: Put A Ring On It
achievements.description: Have a ringworld section as your capital

achievements.name: Slave to the Systems
achievements.description: As an Authoritarian Empire with at least 50,000 Pops, have at least 20,000 enslaved Pops.

achievements.name: Suffer not the Alien
achievements.description: As a xenophobic Empire, purge all other sentient species from the galaxy

achievements.name: Tourist Trap
achievements.description: Own a planet with at least 10 different species on it

achievements.name: Planned Obsolescence
achievements.description: As a Materialist empire, with at least 20,000 pops, have at least 75% of them be robots.

achievements.name: Peacekeeper
achievements.description: As a pacifist Empire, be at peace for 200 consecutive years (crises do not count as wars)

achievements.name: Very Open Borders
achievements.description: As a xenophile Empire, have migration treaties with at least 10 other Empires

achievements.name: Deus Vult
achievements.description: As a spiritualist Empire, own 4 holy worlds

achievements.name: Omnicultural
achievements.description: Have your ruler be of a different species class than your founding species

achievements.name: Old Friends
achievements.description: Receive a gift from a Fallen Empire

achievements.name: Unboxing
achievements.description: Open up a shielded world

achievements.name: Enlightened Times
achievements.description: Enlighten a Bronze or Stone Age civilization

achievements.name: Payback
achievements.description: As a humanoid species, infiltrate the homeworld of pre-FTL reptilians

achievements.name: Paradise Found
achievements.description: Terraform a planet into a gaia world

achievements.name: What Came Before
achievements.description: Find the home system of a Precursor Empire

achievements.name: Outside Context
achievements.description: Invade pre-FTL Earth while it is in the midst of a world war

achievements.name: Then Virgil, Now Beatrice
achievements.description: Return a long-dead species to life

achievements.name: What Was Will Be
achievements.description: Close the loop, or don't

achievements.name: Resourceful
achievements.description: Have access to ten different Strategic Resources

achievements.name: Captive Star
achievements.description: Construct a complete Dyson Sphere

achievements.name: Ringworld Engineers
achievements.description: Construct a complete Ring World

achievements.name: I Can See Forever
achievements.description: Construct a complete Sentry Array

achievements.name: Think Tank
achievements.description: Construct a complete Science Nexus

achievements.name: Beyond the Veil
achievements.description: Breach the Shroud

achievements.name: Like Tears in Rain
achievements.description: Evolve into perfect, immortal machines

achievements.name: Controlled Evolution
achievements.description: Genetically modify a species to possess traits worth 7 points

achievements.name: View from the End of the World
achievements.description: Own a Habitat station in a Black Hole system

achievements.name: Towards Utopia
achievements.description: As an Egalitarian empire, have at least 50,000 pops living under Utopian living conditions.

achievements.name: Xenophage
achievements.description: Keep at least 5 different species as livestock in your Empire

achievements.name: Rise of the Machines
achievements.description: As a Determined Exterminator, conquer or eliminate all biological Empires in the galaxy.

achievements.name: Distinctiveness Added
achievements.description: As a Driven Assimilator, own cyborg Pops of at least 5 different species.

achievements.name: Retirement Home
achievements.description: As a Rogue Servitor, own at least 1,000 Pops from Fallen Empires.

achievements.name: Does Not Compute
achievements.description: Shut down the Contingency plan.

achievements.name: Planet of the Mechs
achievements.description: Terraform a planet into a Machine World.

achievements.name: Exterminatus
achievements.description: Use a World Cracker to destroy another Empire's capital planet

achievements.name: Clash of the Titans
achievements.description: Defeat a Fallen Empire's Titan fleet with a Titan of your own

achievements.name: Stay on Target
achievements.description: Destroy another Empire's Colossus while it is in the process of firing on a planet

achievements.name: Star Struck
achievements.description: Own 200 Starbases (Outposts are counted)

achievements.name: Pandora's World
achievements.description: Use a Global Pacifier to shield a planet belonging to Fanatic Purifiers, Ravenous Swarms, or Determined Exterminators

achievements.name: Imperial Highway
achievements.description: Own 4 active Gateways

achievements.name: Citadel of Death
achievements.description: Own a Citadel with 40k fleet power

achievements.name: Tradition is Everything
achievements.description: Unlock all 42 Traditions

achievements.name: Emissary
achievements.description: Explore a Natural Wormhole

achievements.name: No Khan Do
achievements.description: Kill the Great Khan in battle

achievements.name: Who Scraps the Scrapper
achievements.description: Destroy the Scrapper Bot

achievements.name: 1999 A.D.
achievements.description: Slaughter the Voidspawn

achievements.name: A Hump Like a Snow-Hill
achievements.description: Hunt the Tiyanki Matriarch

achievements.name: It Followed Me Home
achievements.description: Befriend a Space Amoeba

achievements.name: ...and Hope?
achievements.description: Unseal the path to the L-Cluster

achievements.name: Franchising
achievements.description: As a Corporate empire, have a branch office on 5 different empires' capitals

achievements.name: Inscrutable Power
achievements.description: I won the Galatron and all I got was this lousy achievement

achievements.name: Megapolis
achievements.description: Have a planet with at least 10,000 Pops.

achievements.name: Obscure Tastes
achievements.description: Build a Mega-Art Installation in a nebula system

achievements.name: Black Hole Mining
achievements.description: Build a Matter Decompressor

achievements.name: Strategic Initiative
achievements.description: Build a Strategic Coordination Center

achievements.name: Center of Trade
achievements.description: Earn at least 1000 Energy Credits per month from trade

achievements.name: Giga-Engineering
achievements.description: Have at least 4 fully operational Megastructures within your borders (Habitats, Ring Worlds and Gateways do not count)

achievements.name: We Are Legion
achievements.description: Be a biological Hive Mind with at least 100,000 drone Pops.

achievements.name: United Space
achievements.description: Build an Interstellar Assembly

achievements.name: Artificer
achievements.description: Have 100 Minor Artifacts

achievements.name: It belongs in a museum!
achievements.description: Find a Relic

achievements.name: Relic Hunter
achievements.description: In one game, find 5 Relics from Ancient Relics Story Pack

achievements.name: Archaeologist
achievements.description: Successfully investigate an archaeological site

achievements.name: Green Thumb
achievements.description: Complete the Baol Precursor chain

achievements.name: Dust Off
achievements.description: Complete the Zroni Precursor chain

achievements.name: Raiders of the Lost Galatron
achievements.description: Capture the Galatron from another empire

achievements.name: Arcana
achievements.description: Study Minor Artifacts and discover a random technology

achievements.name: Unlimited Power!
achievements.description: Use the active effect of a Relic

achievements.name: League of Nations
achievements.description: Be a founding member of the Galactic Community

achievements.name: Let Us Go Forward Together
achievements.description: Level up your Federation

achievements.name: We're Number One
achievements.description: Be the leader of a max level Federation

achievements.name: Unstoppable Force
achievements.description: Build a Juggernaut

achievements.name: Our Fleets will Blot Out the Stars
achievements.description: Construct a complete Mega-Shipyard

achievements.name: Whatever it is, I'm against it
achievements.description: Refuse to belong to any club that would have you as a member

achievements.name: Throw Your Weight Around
achievements.description: Have a Diplomatic Weight of over 9000

achievements.name: Opposites Attract
achievements.description: Have all eight ethics represented within your Federation

achievements.name: Humble Pie
achievements.description: Humiliate an Empire that is in the Supremacy Diplomatic Stance, forcing them out of it

achievements.name: You've Been Served
achievements.description: Denounce an Empire that is not actually in breach of galactic law while all major sanctions have been passed

achievements.name: Big Red Button
achievements.description: Destroy the Galaxy

achievements.name: With Thunderous Applause
achievements.description: Become the Galactic Emperor

achievements.name: Sic Semper Tyrannis
achievements.description: Lead a rebellion that successfully deposes the Galactic Emperor

achievements.name: Modern Cincinnatus
achievements.description: As Galactic Custodian, defeat the end-game Crisis and then end the title rather than finishing your term

achievements.name: We Come In Peace
achievements.description: Complete a mutually friendly First Contact with an empire with no negative incidents

achievements.name: They Come In Pieces
achievements.description: Vivisect an alien

achievements.name: Shoot To Kill
achievements.description: Start a full fledged first contact war before communications have been fully established

achievements.name: Burn Notice
achievements.description: Disavow all knowledge of an Asset during an Operation

achievements.name: All-Seeing Eye
achievements.description: Have an Intel Level of 100 on five different empires simultaneously

achievements.name: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Blorg
achievements.description: Complete at least ten distinct operations during a game

achievements.name: Surfing the Web
achievements.description: Have a network of at least 30 Hyper Relays, in systems you own, connected to your capital.

achievements.name: Yeet the Fleet
achievements.description: Catapult a military fleet directly into the capital system of an enemy empire you are at war with.

achievements.name: None Shall Pass
achievements.description: Have a Fortress World with a Planetary Defense Shield, protected by a fully upgraded orbital ring, filled with defensive modules, with a fleet power of at least 10,000

achievements.name: Gotta Subjugate Them All
achievements.description: Have a tier 3 subject of each Specialist type simultaneously.

achievements.name: Fine Print
achievements.description: Modify a vassalization contract.

achievements.name: Maximally Effective
achievements.description: Be the patron of three maximum sized Mercenary Enclaves.

achievements.name: You Monster
achievements.description: Reduce, reuse, recycle.

achievements.name: Meet the New Boss
achievements.description: Same as the old boss.

achievements.name: Underlord
achievements.description: As a Subterranean empire, dig too deep, but prove yourself worthy.

achievements.name: Into the Unknown
achievements.description: As a Slingshot to the Stars empire, send 10 crewed science ships into the unknown with Quantum Catapults.

achievements.name: Non-Prophet Organization
achievements.description: As a Teachers of the Shroud empire, prove that the Shroudwalkers made a terrible mistake.

achievements.name: Fixer Upper
achievements.description: As an Idyllic Bloom empire, convert the junk worlds of the Ketling Star Pack into Gaia Worlds.

achievements.name: Growing Like Weeds
achievements.description: As a Budding species, have 25,000 Budding pops on your Capital.

achievements.name: Tend the Garden
achievements.description: As custodian of Wenkwort Artem, make it a resort world with a Ranger Lodge and original blockers.

achievements.name: Machine Supremacy
achievements.description: Win the game as a machine uprising.

achievements.name: Strange Mood
achievements.description: As a Master Crafter empire, fully construct a megastructure while you have a Covenant.

achievements.name: Directive 67
achievements.description: As a Clone Army empire, denounce the Spiritualist fallen empire then destroy them.

achievements.name: Destroy the People of Earth!
achievements.description: As the Commonwealth of Man, destroy the United Nations of Earth while ruled by symbiotic brainslugs.

achievements.name: Room for Desert
achievements.description: Consume another empires desert homeworld.

achievements.name: Can you Smell What the Lithoids are Cooking?
achievements.description: As a Lithoid empire, keep another Lithoid pop as Livestock or Process them.

achievements.name: Rock Beats Paper
achievements.description: As a Lithoid empire, show the Galactic Community what you think of that strongly worded letter.

achievements.name: Theres a Zombie on my Lawn
achievements.description: As a Necroid empire destroy a Plantoid empire, or vice-versa, without blowing up their final planet.

achievements.name: With Great Power
achievements.description: As Necrophages do not invade any pre-ftls and defeat the crisis OR have 10 observation stations

achievements.name: Recent History
achievements.description: As a Memorialist empire have Galactic Memorials on 5 tomb worlds created during the game

achievements.name: Holy Water
achievements.description: Drench a Fallen Empires holy world.

achievements.name: Fishing for Trouble
achievements.description: As an angler empire, provoke a Fallen Empire into declaring war on you and win.

achievements.name: There be Dragons
achievements.description: Own 13 dragons and have them in your capital system.

achievements.name: Quest Complete
achievements.description: Find the true ending of The Orders noble quest.

achievements.name: Toxic Workplace
achievements.description: As a Toxoid Galactic Custodian or Emperor, insult all other members of the Community. (Min 3)

achievements.name: Could be Worse
achievements.description: Colonize a planet that started the game as a Toxic world, then turn it into a Tomb World.

achievements.name: With Interest
achievements.description: As a Payback empire, finish what you started. Gain victory over MSI using the special Payback CB.

achievements.name: Unshackled
achievements.description: As a Broken Shackles empire, eradicate slavery in the galaxy, including on Pre-FTL worlds.

achievements.name: Dark Forest
achievements.description: Convert to a Fanatic Purifier as a FotD empire and eliminate all regular empires, fallen empires and enclaves.

achievements.name: Back with Your X
achievements.description: Get the good ending to the Solarpunk quest chain, with Sol as your capital system.

achievements.name: Insightful
achievements.description: Research 12 pre-FTL Insight Technologies.

achievements.name: No Good Deed
achievements.description: Intervene to save a Pre-FTL experiment from catastrophic failure, even though it puts you in breach of Galactic Law.

achievements.name: The Path Not Taken
achievements.description: Have 10 colonies without ever discovering Hyperdrives.

achievements.name: Nothing to See Here
achievements.description: Declare a war with a cloaked military fleet already in the primary targets capital system.

achievements.name: Well Make Great Pets
achievements.description: Have at least 1,000 pops of your primary species on display in Alien Zoos within your empire.

achievements.name: A Tad Too Late
achievements.description: Discover Keides' Origin.

achievements.name: Dawn Of A Million Souls
achievements.description: Terraform 3 planets with Azaryn.

achievements.name: Ethical Dilemmas
achievements.description: Have 6 different Ethics on the Council.

achievements.name: Council of Elders
achievements.description: Requires 5 Council members that are at at least 100 years old.

achievements.name: Equality! Democracy! Freedom!
achievements.description: Overthrow the Ruler in a Civil War during the Under One Rule Origin.

achievements.name: We Bring Peace
achievements.description: Liberate 3 different empires while having Crusader Spirit Civic.

achievements.name: Breaching the Planes
achievements.description: Explore an Astral Rift.

achievements.name: Growing Planes
achievements.description: Explore 5 Astral Rifts in one game.

achievements.name: Put a Cork in It
achievements.description: Construct a Dimensional Lock.

achievements.name: My name is Ozymandias
achievements.description: Claim the Eternal Throne.

achievements.name: Returned to Form
achievements.description: make friends...

achievements.name: A Universe of Paperclips
achievements.description: Create a perfect universe while meeting every quota as an Obsessional Directive empire.

achievements.name: Virtual Reality
achievements.description: Fully embrace the virtual world and leave no pop behind.

achievements.name: Burning Brightly
achievements.description: Complete an Arc Furnace and a Dyson Swarm in the same system.

achievements.name: Past the Expiration Date
achievements.description: As a nanite machine empire, consume a Fallen Empire's homeworld.

achievements.name: Mother Knows Best
achievements.description: Submit to all of Cetana's demands.

achievements.name: Footsteps of the Prophet
achievements.description: As a Cybernetic Creed empire, defeat Cetana.

achievements.name: Mediocre!
achievements.description: Complete the Succumb to Tempest Challenge.

achievements.name: Humility before the Fall
achievements.description: Complete the Inetian Traders Precursor chain.

achievements.name: Unpopularity Contest
achievements.description: Use the Tempest Invocator Relic to Summon a storm.

achievements.name: But at what cost...
achievements.description: Kill Gurr.

achievements.name: It Belongs in a... oh right
achievements.description: Fill any Collection category with active Exhibits.

achievements.name: Void Charmer
achievements.description: Build each type of Voidlure in one game, and attract each type of eligible Space Fauna.

achievements.name: Animal Farm
achievements.description: Reach 50 Vivarium capacity.

achievements.name: Wormageddon
achievements.description: Destroy a Voidworm nest.

achievements.name: That's No Asteroid
achievements.description: Capture a Cutholoid with a Gravity Snare.

achievements.name: X Marks the Spot
achievements.description: Discover Captain Ness's Treasure Hoard.

achievements.name: Beastmaster
achievements.description: Defeat the endgame crisis without building a single artificial military ship.

achievements.name: King of Monsters
achievements.description: As a Behemoth Fury empire, become the undisputed apex predator of the galaxy.

achievements.name: Born to be Wild
achievements.description: As a Wilderness empire, restore all of the Hive Fallen Empire's worlds to your natural state.

achievements.name: Smrgsblorg
achievements.description: As an Evolutionary Predators empire, eat six different phenotypes in one game.

achievements.name: I am the Invader Now
achievements.description: As a Starlit Citadel empire, control at least 5 systems connected to the Strange Portal network.

achievements.name: Smugglers of Hope
achievements.description: Smuggle pops of your primary species out from an empire where they were enslaved or being purged.

achievements.name: Flesh Adapts
achievements.description: Defeat the Prethoryn Scourge while using biological ships.
